meta.job_title: Senior Strategic Communications Analyst / Technical Editor

duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with clients and partners to manage critical infrastructure analytic projects.
Create operational documentation for NRMC policies, processes, and procedures related to data analytics, risk analysis, and strategic planning.
Write, edit, review & organize written materials, including organization of key sections, tables, exhibits, and attachments.
Provide graphic/layout assistance to ensure quality work product.
Develop understanding and synthesize complex information for communication to people with diverse technical backgrounds.
Develop strategic communications products to keep stakeholders aware and informed of activities.
Support the development and maintenance of plans including vision, mission, goals, and objectives.
Prepare and deliver presentations to senior management.
Assist in aligning organizational investments in people, technology, and capital connected to division strategies.
Support development of business improvement strategies in alignment with priorities.
Develop long-range objectives and strategic plans that identify internal and external strategic issues affecting organizational effectiveness.
Assist with strategic development initiatives and implementation plans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Communications, Public Relations, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
